Source code for lifter_api.utils.exceptions

"""Exceptions for LifterAPI."""



[docs]class Error(Exception):
    """Base class for setting message argument."""

    def __init__(self, message: str = "error"):
        """Construct."""
        self.message = message
        super().__init__(self.message)




[docs]class NotAllowedError(Error):
    """Filler exception."""




[docs]class TokenNotValidError(Error):
    """Authorization token is not valid."""




[docs]class TokenNotProvidedError(Error):
    """Authorization token is not supplied."""




[docs]class MissingOrExtraValuesError(Error):
    """Values or fields are missing when using API."""




[docs]class InvalidDateError(Error):
    """Date input is incorrect."""




[docs]class InvalidDateTimeError(Error):
    """Date time is incorrect."""




[docs]class InvalidLiftsError(Error):
    """Check if the Lifts are valid."""
